verses.verse: Thus the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> were <S%H3615>finished,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of them.

And on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3615>ended<s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made;<s%> and he <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> it: <S%H3588>because<s%> that in it he had <S%H7673>rested<s%> from <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> his <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1254>created<s%> and <S%H6213>made.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and of the <S%H776>earth<s%> when they were <S%H1254>created,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7880>plant<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it <S%H1961>was<s%> in the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6212>herb<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it <S%H6779>grew:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3808>not<s%> caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and there was <S%H369>not<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> to <S%H5647>till<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H127>ground.<s%>
But there went <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H108>mist<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H8248>watered<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H120>man<s%> of the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and <S%H5301>breathed<s%> into his <S%H639>nostrils<s%> the <S%H5397>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life;<s%> and <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5193>planted<s%> a <S%H1588>garden<s%> <S%H4480>eastward<s%> <S%H6924><s%> in <S%H5731>Eden;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> he <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3335>formed.<s%>

And out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> made the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H6779>grow<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> that is <S%H2530>pleasant<s%> to the <S%H4758>sight,<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> for <S%H3978>food;<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> also in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden,<s%> and the <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

And a <S%H5104>river<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of <S%H4480>Eden<s%> <S%H5731><s%> to <S%H8248>water<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1588>garden;<s%> and from <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> it was <S%H6504>parted,<s%> and <S%H1961>became<s%> into <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7218>heads.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>first<s%> is <S%H6376>Pison:<s%> that is <S%H1931>it<s%> which <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> there is <S%H2091>gold;<s%>
And the <S%H2091>gold<s%> of <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> is <S%H916>bdellium<s%> and the <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H1521>Gihon:<s%> the <S%H1931>same<s%> is it that <S%H5437>compasseth<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H2313>Hiddekel:<s%> that is <S%H1931>it<s%> which <S%H1980>goeth<s%> toward the <S%H6926>east<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%> And the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%> is <S%H6578>Euphrates.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H120>man,<s%> and <S%H5117>put<s%> him into the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> to <S%H5647>dress<s%> it and to <S%H8104>keep<s%> it.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Of <S%H4480>every<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> of the <S%H1588>garden<s%> thou mayest freely <S%H398>eat:<s%> <S%H398><s%>

But of the <S%H4480>tree<s%> <S%H6086><s%> of the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H7451>evil,<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> it: <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou <S%H398>eatest<s%> <S%H4480>thereof<s%> thou shalt surely <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> that the <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H905>alone;<s%> I will <S%H6213>make<s%> him a <S%H5828>help<s%> meet for <S%H5048>him.<s%>

And out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3335>formed<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air;<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H121>Adam<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> he would <S%H7121>call<s%> them: and <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> every <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H5315>creature,<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> was the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof.

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H7121>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and to the <S%H5775>fowl<s%> of the <S%H8064>air,<s%> and to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> but for <S%H121>Adam<s%> there was <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> a <S%H5828>help<s%> meet for <S%H5048>him.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> caused a deep <S%H8639>sleep<s%> to <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H121>Adam,<s%> and he <S%H3462>slept:<s%> and he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of his <S%H4480>ribs,<s%> <S%H6763><s%> and closed <S%H5462>up<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> thereof;

And <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6763>rib,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H3947>taken<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H1129>made<s%> he a <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> her <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H120>man.<s%>

And <S%H121>Adam<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>This<s%> is <S%H6471>now<s%> <S%H6106>bone<s%> of my <S%H4480>bones,<s%> <S%H6106><s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of my <S%H4480>flesh:<s%> <S%H1320><s%> <S%H2063>she<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H802>Woman,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H2063>she<s%> was <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of <S%H4480>Man.<s%> <S%H376><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H517>mother,<s%> and shall <S%H1692>cleave<s%> unto his <S%H802>wife:<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
And they <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H6174>naked,<s%> the <S%H120>man<s%> and his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and were <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
